author: ggovi
body:
The external package sqlalchemy is upgraded to version 1.1.4

The change is required to fix several problems recently identified, notably:
- Handling of stale connection in the pool
- handling of queries with long column names, including fully qualified columns

The patches in use for the current version 0.8.2 have been kept unchanged.
title: Upgrade sqlalchemy to 1.1.4
